description: Library to work with gen4-ulcd-D/DT display modules by 4D Systems. This library describes basic operations with common ViSI-Genie objects of the 4D Systems workshop IDE.
name: 4d-ulcd

@/read-dip-switch.description: Reads a value from a genie "DIP SWITCH" object

@/read-knob.description: Reads a value from a genie "KNOB" object

ryeWujWWbE.description: Outputs integer values in a specified range
ryeWujWWbE.label: VAL

@/read-rocker-switch.description: Reads a value from a genie "ROCKER SWITCH" object

@/read-rotaty-switch.description: Reads a value from a genie "ROTARY SWITCH" object

BylQpAZZWE.description: Outputs integer values in a specified range
BylQpAZZWE.label: VAL

@/read-slider.description: Reads a value from a genie "SLIDER" object

rJ4ER0xZE.description: Outputs integer values in a specified range
rJ4ER0xZE.label: VAL

@/read-trackbar.description: Reads a value from a genie "TRACKBAR" object

BJe-DSxb-4.description: Outputs integer values in a specified range
BJe-DSxb-4.label: VAL

@/read-winbutton.description: Reads a value from a genie "WINBUTTON" object

@/write-angular-meter.description: Writes an integer value to a genie "ANDULAR METER" object

Sy7n89CgZE.description: An integer value in a specified range
Sy7n89CgZE.label: VAL

@/write-cool-gauge.description: Writes an integer value to a genie "COOL GAUGE" object

r1gIU_axbN.description: An integer value in a specified range
r1gIU_axbN.label: VAL

@/write-custom-digits.description: Writes an integer value to a genie "CUSTOM DIGITS" object

HymEpnAl-V.description: An integer value in a specified range
HymEpnAl-V.label: VAL

@/write-led.description: Writes an integer value to a genie "LED" object

@/write-led-digits.description: Writes an integer value to a genie "LED DIGITS" object

By4SoGAxbN.description: An integer value in a specified range
By4SoGAxbN.label: VAL

@/write-meter.description: Writes an integer value to a genie "METER" object

HkXmgJ0l-4.description: An integer value in a specified range
HkXmgJ0l-4.label: VAL

@/write-tank.description: Writes an integer value to a genie "TANK" object

rk7d_2Aeb4.description: An integer value in a specified range
rk7d_2Aeb4.label: VAL

@/write-user-led.description: Writes an integer value to a genie "USER LED" object

@/init.description: Initializes a 4D uLCD device with custom settings

BydBdpJWV.description: Triggets a new connection to a display
BydBdpJWV.label: INIT

H1X_SOakbV.description: An UART interface to which 4D ULCD display is wired
H1X_SOakbV.label: UART

SJYuL-ZbE.description: Board port number the RST pin of the  display is connected to.  By default and for the 4D-Arduino-Adaptor-Shield-II RST pin is D4.
SJYuL-ZbE.label: RST
